name: Hypercore (itch)
description:
Dash through the stars in this retro arcade inspired game!

Collect the blue cores to keep your engine from running out of fuel. and avoid the red mines.

Survive longer then the lasers to win.

When the red bar reaches 0 you win when the blue bar reaches 0 you lose.

Controls:

Arrow keys to move

Dash by holding space + arrow key.

Jam Criteria:

Retro:

Inspired by the original game boy, the game features pixel art with a slight bloom to give it a slight pop. 

Laser Beam:

The enemies that come from above shoot a laser, that should be avoided or it will drain your fuel faster

Dash: 

The dashing mechanic allows you to speed through mines and laser without getting damaged. 

Arpeggio:

The music has an arpeggio in it, and was created in a chip-tune creator by me.

Credits:

All art, programming, and music was created by me during the period of the game jam, the two sound effects are from www.gamedevmarket.net.
